about_the_game:
The ASTRALODE Original Soundtrack is a synth-rich set of lo-fi chiptune-flavoured instrumentals with tasty sci-fi atmospherics. The OST is provided through Steam as high-quality MP3s (320 kbps) and FLACs (24-bit), with each track featuring a seamless repeat at the midpoint to recreate the experience of in-game endless loop playback.

Total playtime: 35:52

Music by Trevor McAleese / Drixxel
